option.od: print the help message and exit.
filenames of the fit format files.
files are in the fitacf format.
filename of the fitacf format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Determines the program identifier numbers in fit or fitacf format files.

description.p: Determines the program identifier numbers in fit or fitacf format files.
The total number of program identifiers followed by a list of the identifier numbers is written to standard output.

example.description: Find the program identifier numbers in the fit file "20030408.gbr.fit".
